channel.title: Four problems to solve. Somebody please help! im nub :S
channel.description:
[b]I downloaded a "Mast3r PkyZ" server and client from server download's section. here's the link:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html[/url]
[b]It says it's 525 but it may be 508/525 or whatever idk about those but some people in that thread said something about that. But lets go to the real problems here.[/b]
:( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:
[size=10pt]
1. I am missing Eagle eye shield id so if somebody knows it. Please tell me it or tell me how to find custom item id's if possible?
2. How can i change the Divine spirit shield prayer drain rate and/or make it work like normally so it takes of damage and reduces small amout pray like the real one in runescape :) [i][size=8pt](now it drains alot of prayer on every hit, even if somebody hits 0 it takes away over 5 points of pray so i cant pk with divine at all).[/size][/i]
[size=10pt]3. When pking in the pvp zones that the quest tab loc's teleport you to has a failure: when i kill my friend or he kills me, we ain't getting any drops. I dont lose stuff and he dont lose either. How to fix this so when i kill somebody he loses all stuff worn and i get the loot?
4. Item switching fails a bit. And when fighting it makes it hard i.e to hybrid pk: When switching armor and melee wep or robes and staff. Always one item doesn't wear. (i use this server/client just to 1v1 pk with my friend thru hamachi connection so im not making this public etc if anybody thinks i am and thinks its wrong or sumthing)
If anybody knows, and helps it would be much appreciated. Or if anybody can redirect me to a topic(s) that give me a TuToRiAl or help on how to change/modify these features :) I'm a newbie at this but not a RtRd :P THX! [/size]

item.title: Four problems to solve. Somebody please help! im nub :S
item.dc:creator: @kebbonen kebbonen
item.description:
@kebbonen wrote:

I downloaded a “Mast3r PkyZ” server and client from server download’s section.
here’s the link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459671.0.html

It says it’s 525 but it may be 508/525 or whatever idk about those but some people in that thread said something about that. But lets go to the real problems here.

:eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

[size=10pt]

  1. I am missing Eagle eye shield id so if somebody knows it. Please tell me it or tell me how to find custom item id’s if possible?

  2. How can i change the Divine spirit shield prayer drain rate and/or make it work like normally so it takes of damage and reduces small amout pray like the real one in runescape [size=8pt](now it drains alot of prayer on every hit, even if somebody hits 0 it takes away over 5 points of pray so i cant pk with divine at all).[/size]

[size=10pt]3. When pking in the pvp zones that the quest tab loc’s teleport you to has a failure: when i kill my friend or he kills me, we ain’t getting any drops. I dont lose stuff and he dont lose either. How to fix this so when i kill somebody he loses all stuff worn and i get the loot?

  1. Item switching fails a bit. And when fighting it makes it hard i.e to hybrid pk: When switching armor and melee wep or robes and staff. Always one item doesn’t wear. (i use this server/client just to 1v1 pk with my friend thru hamachi connection so im not making this public etc if anybody thinks i am and thinks its wrong or sumthing)

If anybody knows, and helps it would be much appreciated. Or if anybody can redirect me to a topic(s) that give me a TuToRiAl or help on how to change/modify these features I’m a newbie at this but not a RtRd THX!
[/size]

Read full topic
